ingredients.item: 400g pack essential Waitrose British Chicken Breast Chunks
500g jar essential Waitrose Tikka Masala Sauce

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a large saucepan and fry the chicken for 5 minutes. Add the lentils and sauce. Cover and simmer for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. Check the chicken is cooked through with no pink meat.
Stir in the coriander and serve with rice, if using.
